name: Duelingnexus chat/monster info split view
description: Save screen space on duelingnexus by making more UI scroll and fit onto the screen compactly.
additional_info: This css is a basic change splitting the left side view in a game on dueling nexus into two non overlapping parts so they do not obscure each other - they are also both made scrollable to accommodate for the loss of vertical space, along with part of the card image. As duelingnexus itself improves it's UI some parts of this style have been removed when they become redundant. This style is also hosted on github and licensed under MIT. The versions of this code prior to 11/7/17 were hosted under CC0 and are public domain and the versions after that and prior to 21/7/17 were hosted under GPL3. Now all the styles in the repository are MIT licensed, and the other styles there were never licensed under any license prior to MIT.
